title: Communicate to live
creator_credit: Ronnie Whitehouse, Sam Napier-Bell, Post Office Telecommunications and Basic Films
brief_description: Shows how communication is essential to a wide range of animal life, and gives a history of human communication and the possibilities for electronic communication in the future.
